reviewText:
This was horrible. Has nothing to do with yoga designed for firefighters. Do not buy this if your looking anything to do to better prepare your body for the job.
-Career firefighter

I went to one of the Chopra Center's retreats and was able to attend a couple of Claire's classes in person. She is incredible! This is a great exercise program for athletes and helpful for people who are very physically active and want to prevent injury. The music and backdrop make this video a great experience. I wish she would make more!
